這是一個由我製作的初音未來主題戰雷自訂瞄具模組。
靈感來自她那句經典的吐槽：「センスねぇー♥」（真沒品味呢～♥）。

裝上後，每次開炮都像有初音在旁邊看著你，
命中或沒中都能感受到那份可愛又微妙的嘲諷感。

讓戰場不再只有硝煙，還多了一點二次元的樂趣。
希望你們會喜歡這個小小的創作！💙

This is a custom War Thunder sight mod created by me, inspired by Hatsune Miku.
The concept comes from her iconic teasing line: “センスねぇー♥” (No sense of style~♥).

With this sight equipped, it feels like Miku is watching you every time you fire —
whether you hit or miss, that cute yet mocking expression is always there.

Adding a bit of anime charm to the battlefield.
Hope you enjoy it! 💙

#hatsune_miku #miku #sight #anime

My Crosshair №14
#anime
#zzz

#anime #klara #gup #girls_und_panzer #pravda #alltanks

Gooner sight of Nonna from Girls und Panzers.

One of my friends recently reached out to me with an image that he wanted to turn into a custom war thunder sight, but he "does not have the skill or patience to do so" and therefore demanded suggested that I, with my very limited knowledge of war thunder sights, would do it for him. I was very pleased with the outcome and as such I decided to upload it as my first uploaded war thunder sight.

The artist who made the original image is unknown to me, but I do give all credit to them. If you know who they are or perhaps you even are them,...

#utauloid #teto #teto_kasane #wtdraw
Leader Teto sight

Pink shark thing

- 6 files: 3 with shading and 3 sizes and one without shading and its own 3 sizes. I went too far into detail on the smaller lines, so some may end up looking more pixelated on smaller resolutions/sizes which I now know not to do for my future sights

- If you want me to make you a sight, ask me on discord: corndoggle
#wtdraw #shark #furry
